com.adobe.cq.testing.junit.rules

Class DefaultReplicationAgents

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adobe.cq.testing.junit.rules.DefaultReplicationAgents
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.junit.rules.TestRule

    public class DefaultReplicationAgents
extends Object
implements org.junit.rules.TestRule

    Adapts the default replication agents on the author to target the provided publish.

    WARNING: make sure the input Instance rules (authorRule and publishRule) are applied before this one, otherwise it will fail to retrieve the urls of the two instances. The easiest way is to use a RuleChain, where this rule is the last one

    Usually this is applied at class level to avoid stressing the target instance for each test

      • configure

        protected boolean configure()

        Whether to configure the agents or not.

        Used to ensure that the agents are configured only if a certain condition is met. This default implementation always returns true, but subclasses can override it.

        Returns:
        true

      • configureReplicationAgents

        protected void configureReplicationAgents()
                                   throws org.apache.sling.testing.clients.ClientException,
                                          InterruptedException
        Configure the replication agents to getReplicationAgent() and getReverseReplicationAgent()
        Throws:
        org.apache.sling.testing.clients.ClientException - if an error happened during configuration
        InterruptedException - to mark this operation as waiting; the exception should be thrown up the stack

      • cleanup

        protected void cleanup()
        Performs the cleanup after evaluating the statement. This default implementation doesn't do anything.

      • getReplicationAgent

        protected String getReplicationAgent()
        Returns the path to the replication agent on the publishRule instance. This default implementation returns the value of ReplicationClient.PUBLISH_REPLICATION_DEFAULT_AGENT
        Returns:
        the path to the replication agent

      • getReverseReplicationAgent

        protected String getReverseReplicationAgent()
        Returns the path to the reverse replication agent on the publishRule instance. This default implementation returns the value of ReplicationClient.PUBLISH_REVERSE_REPLICATION_DEFAULT_AGENT
        Returns:
        the path to the reverse replication agent
